name: Ciprofloxacin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A CORN

contraindications.text: ciprofloxacin tablets administered orally described appropriate guidelines tables .

warningsAndPrecautions: ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 500 mg available oval shaped , white film-coated tablets , debossed “ y102 ” one side . ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 500 mg available bottles 6 , 10 , 14 20. strength ndc code tablet identification bottles 6 500 mg ndc 82804-130-06 y102 bottles 10 500 mg ndc 82804-130-10 y102 bottles 14 500 mg ndc 82804-130-14 y102 bottles 20 500 mg ndc 82804-130-20 y102 bottles 30 500 mg ndc 82804-130-30 y102 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . preserve well-closed container .
contraindications_original: Ciprofloxacin tablets should be administered orally as described in the appropriate Dosage Guidelines tables.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 500 mg are available as oval shaped, white film-coated tablets, debossed with “Y102” on one side.
                  Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 500 mg are available in bottles of 6, 10, 14 and 20.
